category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_VP_Use_Revision
preference.preference_description: Specifies the Vendor Part revision used to search Vendor Parts. This value is used by the "imds_transform_dat_to_xml" utility. Valid values are: * 0: the first revision is used. This is the default value. * 1: the latest revision is used.
